_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Four things not truly known or seen [sn4: Form, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation
Feeling, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation
Perception, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation
Choices, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation
Consciousness, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation
Four things truly known and seen (a repe: Form, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation
Feeling, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation
Perception, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation
Choices, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation
Consciousness, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation
